A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay I'm seriously the biggest Star Wars fan. I was born in 77 and grew up with these movies. I loved EP7 and had high hopes. Don't waste your time. Disney has ruined my childhood. Too much humor\, bad acting\, horrid screen transitions. I can't even go into my Star Wars room as I'm still nauseous. Save your money and go out to dinner.
